name: Grappling game
description:
First game jam !!

Windows version at the bottom 

This is an awesome game developed by team of 3 young developers Prakul K Hebbur, Sanay , Aman. If u want to test the game pls go forward. Leaderboard system has little problems but we learnt a lot.

How to play ?

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Right

D- Left

Left  click for Hookshoting to the objects

Right Click for shooting the ball

Note : Shoot the ball 5 time to continue the game !

Hope you enjoy it

Regards Prakul K Hebbur

Assets used in The game 

  1. Unity's Snaps Prototyping Pack.

Roles 

Prakul K Hebbur - Programmer

Snany - Programer

Aman - 3D Artist
